title: Is Tik-Tok the first global application? - Quora

response.answer_text: I don’t think that TikTok is the first global application.  (WhatsApp Revenue and Usage Statistics (2020)) Based on the statistics, Facebook Messenger, Facebook, WhatsApp all are listed ahead of TikTok from the perspective of download which is one of the most important factors for an application to become global. (1) TikTok was first launched by Bytedance for the China market in September 2016 and for iOS and Android outside of Chinese markets in 2017. It was only available in the US after merging with  TikTokPoint your camera at the QR code to download TikTokhttp://Musical.ly  in August 2018 and rapidly becomes popular in East Asia, South Asia, Southeast Asia, the United States, Turkey, Russia, and other parts of the world. Analytics platform Sensor Tower reported that TikTok has been downloaded more than 2 billion times globally and is popular in East Asia, South Asia, Southeast Asia, the United States, Turkey, Russia, and other parts of the world.  (TikTok Revenue and Usage Statistics (2020)) Let’s see the most preferred messenger app in the world today - WhatsApp usage statistics, just for example. WhatsApp was first developed in 2009 and acquired by Facebook in 2014. By 2015, it became the world’s most popular messaging application. It has over 2 billion users all over the world this February and becomes most popular in Latin America, the Indian Subcontinent, and large parts of Europe and Africa.  (WhatsApp Revenue and Usage Statistics (2020))  In 2018, when TikTok was just starting to become popular in the US, WhatsApp has reached 1.5 billion users worldwide. As the data show that WhatsApp is just only one of the global applications that are developed far ahead of TikTok. Facebook, Facebook Messenger, WeChat and many other applications are truly global applications that have tremendous amount of users and enjoy gigantic amount of downloads. Therefore, I would positively say that TikTok is not the first global application although it is now has a global reputation. Thanks for reading.
